name: Return Fire (itch)
description:
---Return Fire---

This is a shooting game where the player starts without bullets. 

The only way to  aquire them is to pick up the bullets fired by the enemies.

You can only take damage from bullets when firing, but don't let the enemies reach the bottom of the screen, or you will lose health.

Enemies will sometimes drop power ups and health when killed.

The game is complete after 50 'pattens' have been completed, these are mostly randomly selected and ramp up in difficulty as the game progresses.

---Controls
Arrow Keys to move

Z to shoot

Esc for menu

------------------------------------------------------------------

Made with monogame for the Devtober 2020 game jam
